answers.answer: They said my baby weight is 4pounds & 4oz and I'm 32 weeks & a day they consider it normal my other children weight 7-7'14oz and my first pregnancy was 5'9oz.

I had my ultrasound yesterday i was 30 weeks 1 day n my baby is about 4lbs as well. The technician said they cant b exact so its give or take 8 oz. I guestimated that if i go to 40 weeks he will b about 9lbs. I freaked out a little myself. But as long as hes healthy ill take it.

that sounds just slightly above average to me. i think at 30 weeks the baby should weight roughly 3lbs and your alittle past that point. so sounds like your on track. i recently had an ultrasound for the same reason at about 30 wks 5days but wont hear what they saw until i see my ob this Tuesday. i have gestesinal diabetes so that's why i was sent for the ultrasound. im measuring normal so im hoping to be around 3-4 lbs too. im guessing like you said you make big healthy babies nothing wrong with that! there hasn't been a baby in my family under 8lbs like ever so even before i got diagnosed with gd i was anticipating a big baby.
I'm 30w4d with DS and yesterday they said he's 4lbs 15 oz. I wouldn't worry. Boys are bigger and those numbers arnt always accurate

I went in at 28 weeks and 5 days and they said mine was 4 lbs already! I'm scared about labor and delivery already and now I feel like I'm doing something wrong for my baby to gain more than normal weight. And my due date is Feb 18th but since that U/S it says Jan. 29th... scared FTM23 problems...

question: I went for my ultrasound today and the lady said the baby is 4 pounds already iam kinda worried also my gestational diabetes test was borderline, could that be one reason hes big. My son was 8 pds 8 ounces my daughter was 6 pds 12 ounces and my third child weighed 8 pds. 12 ounces. I have healthy pregnancies and maybe its normal for me to have bigger boys. Positive answers are welcome :)
title: 31 weeks 2 days question!!
